content.txt1: Saa dwumadie yi tumi yɛ dwumadie a ɛte sɛ onipa ankasa dwumadie a nea ɛka ho ne, nanso ɛnyɛ ne nyinaa ne sɛ wobɛkyere, woabue apps, ne nea ɛkeka ho wɔ wo fon so, na ɛbɛtumi nso abue sikatua ho akwammisa bi ama sikatua. Esiane sɛ asiane ahorow wɔ hɔ a ɛne sɛ wɔbɛyɛ adwuma a wɔakyere agu hama so, sikatua, ne nea ɛkeka ho nti, yɛhyɛ nyansa denneennen sɛ sɛ wote script no mu nsɛm ase yiye nkutoo a.
content.txt2: Sɛnea wobɛto saa dwumadie yi mu: Bue application yi home page, wobɛtumi agyae adwuma aboafoɔ dwumadie wɔ home page settings no mu, anaa wobɛtumi akliki "Close All Tasks and Exit" button a ɛwɔ home page no so. Saa bɔtn yi hyɛ nnwuma a wɔreyɛ nyinaa mu a wɔbɛto mu na ɛhyɛ sɛ wɔbɛto app yi mu.
content.txt3: Nea enti a yɛde saa dwumadie yi di dwuma ne sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn application no nya tumi a ɛbɛma yɛabue application foforɔ na yɛatumi adi so, te sɛ sɛ wo browsing Instagram a, ɛtumi twetwe kɔ soro ara kwa wɔ video no akyi, hwɛ sɛ adeɛ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔtɔn, na yɛde nkrasɛm kɔma ntanet so nnamfo daa, ne nea ɛkeka ho, a ɛyɛ anigyeɛ anaa adwumayɛfoɔ-gye adwuma.
content.title: Adwumayɛ a asiane wom .
